name: Duck Thing's Upside Down Adventure
description:
Help Duck Thing reach his goals by turning his world upside down.

------------------------------------

This is prototype for a puzzly adventure that I'm using to teach myself Gamemaker - have a poke around and let me know what yo think!

So far Duck Thing has like 20 rooms to solve. Over time I'll expand this game with levels features like key and lock puzzles, spikey traps, and racoon things(?).
